newsitem.title: USA: Number Nine Q2 hit by lower sales volume.
newsitem.headline: Number Nine Q2 hit by lower sales volume.

text.p: Number Nine Visual Technology Corp said Wednesday that the net loss it registered during the second quarter was mainly due to a lower than expected sales volume.
Number Nine, which reported a loss of $1.06 a share against a loss of $0.97 a year ago, said pricing on some of its products and merchant technology were also a factor.
It said in a statement it had also bolstered research and development during that period.
Based in Lexington, Mass, Number Nine makes computer software and graphics and video products.
